title: Sister Wives Sibling Is 'Having a Hard Time' With Garrison's Death
description: 'Sister Wives' star Savanah Brown opened up about how she's been handling the aftermath of her brother Garrison Brown's death
snippet:
Sister Wives star Garrison Brown’s sister Savanah Brown got candid about how she’s navigated the loss of her brother.

“Two weeks ago, on Tuesday, March 5...
